title: 8 tips for an eco-friendly kitchen remodel, according to pros | - Homes & Gardens
summary: The article provides tips and advice on how to remodel a kitchen sustainably by making eco-friendly choices in design, materials, and products.
green_innovation: FALSE, The article focuses on eco-friendly practices in remodeling a kitchen but does not introduce significant new processes or products that contribute to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: FALSE, The article does not introduce a new or significantly improved product or business process to the market. It mainly discusses sustainable design choices for kitchen remodeling.
green_product: TRUE, The article discusses using environmentally friendly materials, sustainable design choices, and eco-conscious products in remodeling a kitchen, aligning with the principles of a green product.
green_process: TRUE, The article highlights sustainable design practices and environmentally conscious processes in remodeling a kitchen, such as using reclaimed materials, low VOC paints, and natural resources efficiently.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 236220 - Commercial and Institutional Building Construction, 238350 - Finish Carpentry Contractors, 337110 - Wood Kitchen Cabinet and Countertop Manufacturing, 444190 - Other Building Material Dealers
greenwashing: FALSE, The article does not display characteristics of greenwashing as it provides genuine advice on sustainable kitchen remodeling without exaggerating environmental claims.
